name: Western Wasteland Racer
description:
The ultimate western wasteland racing is finally here!

Western Wasteland Racer is an awesome racing game, featuring superior physics, gorgeous graphics and of course easy gameplay.

Drive your car through highways. Speed up like a gust of wind! Wanna be a top racer? Come on, this racing game has them all.

Features

- NO in app purchases.
- Easy game play.
- Great 3D graphics.
- Awesome music.
- Endless fun!

The simple game control and cool graphics will bring you an exciting experience of speed and drift. What are you waiting for? Download Western Wasteland Racer now!
